home.intro: This template provides a solid foundation for any full-stack web development project:
home.secureLogin: Secure login/logout functionality — Protect access with user authentication.
home.userMgmt: User management with a database — Handle user data and roles with PostgreSQL.
home.roleAccess: Role-based access control — Control access for different users across the app.
home.responsiveLayout: Responsive layout with a navigation bar — A clean, mobile-friendly interface powered by ReactJS.
home.signInDesc: Log in to access your account and dashboard. Visit the "User" section to explore more features.
scenarios: After signing up, skip email verification and try to sign up again with the same email.
Try signing in with a forgotten password.
Test the app’s responsiveness across devices: desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Sign in with or without selecting the "Trust this device" checkbox, then try reloading the page.

moderator.privatePage: This page is private and accessible only to Moderators.

scenario.markInappropriate: Mark the post as inappropriate and hide it from the Moderate Posts section.
scenario.viewHiddenPost: Attempt to view the hidden post.
scenario.restorePost: Restore the post from the Hidden Posts section.
scenario.repeatCommentActions: Repeat these actions for comments on posts.

error.serverUnreachable: Server is unreachable. Please check your connection or try again later.
error.accessDenied: Access denied. You might not have permission to view this
error.unauthorized: Unauthorized. Please log in and try again
error.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
error.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

user.welcome: Welcome! You're now a registered user!
user.privatePage: This page is private and accessible only to signed-in users.
user.updateProfileDesc: Click on the profile image to edit your picture, username, email, password, or even delete your account.
user.subscribeDesc: Head to the Subscriber section and click "Subscribe Now" to get full access (no credit card required for test purposes, just hit the button).

scenario.deleteAndSignup: - Try deleting your account and signing up again with the same email.
scenario.adminRoles: - From the Admin section, create, edit, and delete roles. Then test access behavior with various role permissions.

admin.privatePage: This page is private and accessible only to Administrators.

scenario.modifyRoles: - Create, edit or delete roles. Modify a user's allowed roles.
scenario.viewHistory: - View the Login History and audit logs for role changes.
scenario.adjustSettings: - Adjust settings and observe how features are enabled or disabled. Some features may be restricted by higher-tier administrators.

signin.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
signin.verificationResent: The verification email has been successfully resent. It usually arrives within a few seconds, but depending on traffic, it may take up to several minutes—up to 30 minutes in some cases.
signin.resendVerificationFailed: Failed to resend verification email. Try again in 15 minutes.

errors.popupRequest: Only one popup request allowed at a time.
errors.userNotRegistered: User not registered. Please Sign Up
errors.serverUnreachable: Server is unreachable. Please check your connection or try again later.
errors.googleFailed: Failed to sign in with Google.
errors.verifyEmail: Please verify your email before logging in. Check your spam folder
errors.wrongEmailOrPassword: Incorrect email or password, or account does not exist.

resetPassword.title: Change password
resetPassword.loadingMessage: Please, wait. It may take up to a minute.
resetPassword.successMessage: If this account is registered in our system, an email with instructions to reset your password has been sent. Please check your inbox or spam folder.
resetPassword.emailNotFound: This email was not found in our database

profile.deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.dragDropInstruction: Drag & drop an image here, or
profile.unsupportedFileFormat: Unsupported file format. Please upload a JPG, PNG or WEBP image.
profile.accountDeletedSuccess: Account deleted successfully. Redirecting to home page...
profile.accountDeletionFailed: Account deletion failed. Please try again.

validation.username: 4 to 24 characters. Must begin with a letter. Letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens allowed.
validation.email: Must be a valid email address. Special characters allowed: . - _

profile.validationError: Validation error. Please check your input.
profile.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
profile.testPurposesCannotModifyAccount: For test purposes, this account cannot be modified or deleted
profile.socialVisibilityInfo: Turn this on or off to control whether others can find and connect with you. You will still appear in Followers and Following lists, private messages (if connected), and in the Posts section if you have published content.
profile.adminVisibilityInfo: Toggle to allow or prevent administrators from viewing your profile in the Admin Users section.
profile.loginHistoryVisibilityInfo: Toggle to allow or prevent administrators from seeing your profile in the Login History section.

signup.pleaseCheckInbox: Please check your inbox (or spam folder) to verify your account.
signup.verificationEmailNote: The verification email usually arrives within a few seconds, but depending on traffic, it may take up to several minutes, up to 30 minutes in some cases.
signup.name: Name

validationMessages.name: 4 to 24 characters. Must begin with a letter. Letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens allowed.
validationMessages.email: Must be a valid email address. Special characters allowed . - _
validationMessages.password: 8 to 24 characters. Must include uppercase and lowercase letters, a number, and a special character. Allowed: !@#$%^&*.
validationMessages.confirmPassword: Must match the first password input field.

errors.userEmailExists: User with this email already exists.
errors.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.

posts.reportedPendingReview: This post has been reported and is pending moderator review. You can still see it by clicking here, but discretion is advised.
posts.hiddenByModerator: This post has been reported and reviewed by a moderator. It was deemed inappropriate and has been hidden.

postsInteractions.forbidden: Forbidden: You are not allowed to react

writePost.errorFailed: Failed to create the post. Please try again.

filterUsername.title: Only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, carets, and spaces are allowed.

socialAllUsers.title: Social - All Users
socialAllUsers.noUsersOrMuted: No users available or all users are muted.

socialFollowee.title: Following
socialFollowee.noUsers: No users available or all users are muted.

socialFollowers.title: Followers
socialFollowers.noUsers: No users available or all users are muted.

socialMuted.title: Muted Users
socialMuted.infoMessage: You cannot interact with users you've muted, and they will not be able to interact with you either.

followUserButton.errorSendFollow: Failed to send follow request. Please try again later.
followUserButton.errorUnfollow: Failed to unfollow. Please try again later.
followUserButton.errorApproveFollower: Failed to approve follower. Please try again later.
followUserButton.errorCancelRequest: Failed to cancel follow request. Please try again later.

subscriber.welcomeTitle: Awesome! You're now a subscribed user!
subscriber.privateNotice: This page is private. Only subscribed users can access it.
subscriber.daysRemaining_one: Your subscription will remain active for {{count}} more day unless revoked by an Administrator.
subscriber.daysRemaining_other: Your subscription will remain active for {{count}} more days unless revoked by an Administrator.
subscriber.exploreTitle: Would you like to keep exploring the app?
subscriber.adminSigninDesc: Log in with the email "admin@socialtemplate.manucasanova.com" and password G7m!pLz@92aT.
subscriber.modifyRoles: - Modify user roles in the 'Admin Users' section and use the filter to search by username or ID.
subscriber.viewHistory: - View the login history and audit logs to track changes to user roles.
subscriber.updateRoles: - Find your user and update its roles, such as becoming a moderator or an administrator.
subscriber.testRevokeSelf: - As an administrator, attempt to revoke your own Admin role or modify another Admin's roles.
subscriber.manageRoles: - Create, edit, and delete roles. Then test access behavior with various role permissions.

appSetup.accessRestricted: Access to this feature is restricted to upgraded subscriptions or authorized higher-level admins.
appSetup.note: Note: Super Admins can modify both Super Admin and Admin settings. However, if a Super Admin setting is disabled, the corresponding Admin setting cannot be enabled or modified. To allow changes, the Super Admin setting must first be enabled in the Super Admin configuration section.
appSetup.emailInfoMessage: If active, users are allowed to change their email address and must verify the new email to complete the process. However, once changed, access via the original email will be disabled. This creates a risk where a malicious user could take over an account by changing the email. To enhance security and prevent unauthorized access, it's strongly recommended to block email changes.
appSetup.usersCanChangeProfileImage: Users Can Change their Profile Image
appSetup.adminsCanCreateCustomRole: Admins Can Create a Custom Role
appSetup.adminsCanEditCustomRole: Admins Can Edit a Custom Role
appSetup.adminsCanDeleteCustomRole: Admins Can Delete a Custom Role
appSetup.showSuperAdminInUsersAdmin: Show Super Admins in Users Admin Section
appSetup.showSuperAdminInLoginHistory: Show Super Admins in Login History

adminUsers.title: Admin Users
adminUsers.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

adminRoles.title: Admin Roles
adminRoles.customRolesInfo: These roles are associated with a protected route (accessible through the navbar) and can be accessed by SuperAdmins, Admins, Moderators, and any users assigned to them. Only the role creators or higher-tier administrators can edit or delete these custom roles.
adminRoles.noCustomRoles: There are no custom roles yet.
adminRoles.warning: Warning: Depending on your app configuration, this action may not be possible. For example: “Cannot delete this role because there are items linked to it,” or “Deleting this role will also remove all associated items.”
adminRoles.roleNameRegex: Role name must be 1–25 characters and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, dots, and underscores.

roleChangeLog.title: User role change log
roleChangeLog.infoText: This role was reassigned because the original user who granted it no longer has SuperAdmin access. Role management authority has been transferred to the SuperAdmin who removed their access.

filterLoginHistory.invalidUsername: Only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, carets, and spaces are allowed.

usersWithMessages.title: Chats
usersWithMessages.infoMessage: The social connections feature has been disabled by a higher-tier administrator. You can still message users you previously connected with, but messaging new users is no longer available.
usersWithMessages.noUsers: No users with messages found or users are muted.

rolePage.title: Access restricted: Only users with the “{{role}}” role can view this page.
rolePage.scenarioManageRoles: - From the Admin section, create, edit, and delete roles. Then test access behavior with various role permissions.

chat.chatWithDeleted: Chat with a user who deleted their account
chat.emptyWarning: Please fill out the message field.

error.title: Error
suggestions: Close the browser and sign in again.
If the issue persists, contact the web administrator and provide this error message:

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You do not have access to the requested page.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for does not exist.

registerControllerEmail.subject: Email Verification - Fullstack Template
registerControllerEmail.instruction: Thank you for registering with us! To complete your registration, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
registerControllerEmail.disclaimer: If you did not create an account with us, please ignore this email. Your email is safe.

passwordResetEmail.subject: Password Reset - Fullstack Template
passwordResetEmail.instruction: We received a request to reset your password. This link is valid for 1 hour. Please click the button below to set a new password.
passwordResetEmail.disclaimer: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your account is still secure.

usersController.cannotDeleteHere: Permission denied: You cannot delete your own account here. Do it from 'My account'
usersController.accountCannotBeModified: This account cannot be modified, as it ensures at least one Admin remains.
usersController.accountCannotBeDeleted: This account cannot be deleted, as it ensures at least one Admin remains.
usersController.cannotDeleteThisSuperadmin: You are not authorized to delete this SuperAdmin because you did not assign their role.
usersController.cannotModifyOtherAdmins: Admins cannot modify other Admins' roles
usersController.superAdminsCanModifySuperAdminsIf: SuperAdmins can only modify other Superadmin roles if they assigned the SuperAdmin role to that user.
usersController.cannotRevokeYourSuperAdminRole: You cannot revoke your own SuperAdmin role
usersController.cannotRevokeYourAdminRole: You cannot revoke your own Admin role
usersController.cannotModifyThisUserRoles: You are not allowed to modify this user's roles
usersController.cannotRemoveAdminWhileSuperadmin: Cannot remove Admin while SuperAdmin is still assigned
usersController.cannotRemoveRoleWhileAdmin: Cannot remove this role while Admin is still assigned.
